name: RadioRA Essentials Project Database
summary: Learn about .LUT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Since Lutron Electronics only distributes the RadioRA Essentials software to factory-trained installers, customers of RadioRA systems typically never use LUT files.
RadioRA Essentials version 2 introduced the new .LUTX format. You can upgrade LUT files to the LUTX format with this version of the software.
NOTE: RadioRA Essentials is no longer available for download.

description: File created by RadioRA Essentials, a program used to set up wireless total home control systems from Lutron Electronics; contains configuration and control information for the thermostat and lighting components of a house or other building; can be deployed to a RadioRA system when complete.
